api

Interface Client2Master

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Master

    public interface Client2Master
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Defines the interface through which the application programmer communicates with the Master.
    Author:
    Prakash Chandrasekaran, Gautham Narayanasamy, Vijayaraghavan Subbaiah

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static java.lang.String SERVICE_NAME

      Submits the graph problem to be computed.
      java.lang.String takeResult()
      Take the file (specified by its name) that stores the computed result from the Master.

    • Method Detail

      • putTask

        <T> void putTask(java.lang.String graphFileName,
               java.lang.String vertexClassName,
               long sourceVertexID,
               Data<T> data)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Submits the graph problem to be computed.
        Parameters:
        graphFileName - the graph file name
        vertexClassName - the application specific vertex class name
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • takeResult

        java.lang.String takeResult()
                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Take the file (specified by its name) that stores the computed result from the Master.
        Returns:
        string representing the output file name.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
